metadata.dc:description: Dateset containing estimated distributions of COVID-19 deaths and population size by race and Hispanic origin. The percentages of COVID-19 deaths by race and Hispanic origin were calculated by dividing the number of COVID-19 deaths for each race and Hispanic origin group by the total number of COVID-19 deaths.
